name: Skill Converter Agent
description: Directory-first converter for transforming a generic skill into a Skill-Runner AutoSkill package.

prompts.gemini: Use skill `skill-converter-agent` in auto-execution mode. First run `zip_directory_wrapper.py --mode unpack` to unzip {{ input.source_skill_package }} to a workspace directory, then run the same directory conversion logic, then optionally repack via `--mode pack`. Apply prompt-based classification and conversion. Always run final validator `validate_converted_skill.py`. Return only final JSON.
